subject: Football (College)
Television
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
College Football Playoff National Championship
lead_paragraph: Alabama’s 45-40 victory over Clemson on Monday night drew an average of 25.7 million viewers on ESPN, a substantial drop from the 33.4 million who watched last year’s game.
snippet: Alabama’s 45-40 victory over Clemson on Monday night drew an average of 25.7 million viewers on ESPN, a substantial drop from the 33.4 million who watched last year’s game.
